WorkItem.Description:
Hello

Any idea, how i could find out whats wrong. When i try to make custom update, GUI crashes after adding "action" to the custom update.

Wsus version 3.2.7600.265

Wsus Packagepublisher Release v1.3.1504.15

Any help appreciated.

Comments.Message:
Can you send me the debug file at package.publisher@free.fr


Thanks
Btw: Your WSUS isn't up to date. It's missing http://www.microsoft.com/de-de/download/details.aspx?id=43633

Yes, i know. 

But we have 2 networks with same wsus version and package publisher works in other setup without errors.

Hello

Any updates on this matter, last version you gave me did not solve the problem.
